data.title: Great, Funky Place!
data.text: Love the mis-matched chairs and feel to this place. A great place to grab a drink and listen to live music.

data.title: The deli is delicious
data.text: Wonderful sandwiches with a good price point. Go here for lunch. Right in the corner pub. Friendly staff.

data.title: Great Hangout Place
data.text: Live music on the weekends and cold beer.  The staff is friendly. The food is good. The building has a great rustic feel.

data.title: Another fantastic local venue
data.text: The charm of this pub brings back memories of old town Conroe.  The owners are fantastic and they have great music.  Its a comfortable relaxed place to visit with friends.

data.title: Corner Pub in Conroe
data.text: The Corner Pub is a local hotspot for those who work in downtown Conroe, and attracts music artists and those looking for a relaxing environment after a hard days work.

data.title: Ok Place, Good Music
data.text: We went out for drinks and music, and decided to try this place. The atmosphere was OK, maybe perhaps for an older crowd. There was a 2 year old girl just running around all over the bar while everyone was drinking, which made me feel a little uncomfortable. In spite of this, we decided to stay to hear the live band. Glad we did, because the music was great. I would probably return for a low key night out, and hopefully there wouldn't be small children present.

data.title: Watering Hole for the Locals
data.text:
Interesting little bar and sandwich spot right in downtown Conroe. Fair bottled beer selection, only four tap beers but consistently out of one or two selections. Sandwiches are ok and fast service if your dealing with the Court of local Justice here in Conroe TX.
Nice bar and table seating with a smoking area outside.

data.title: Great local venue In Conroe
data.text: The Corner Pub is pretty awesome.  It's a non-smoking venue and has a great Chicago deli in the rear of the venue.  Located in the nostalgic downtown Conroe area, The Corner Pub is an excellent place to listen to local bands and enjoy a drink or beer.

data.title: Corner Pub has Great Live Music
data.text: This neat little corner pub has great live music.  We went there to see artist, Neil Austin Imber & the  Powell Brothers and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.

data.title: It's ok for a quick lunch when in court
data.text: I had court and decided to try this place, great customer service, great decor and acceptable sandwiches, place doesn't have a variety of food just mostly sandwiches it gets a B

data.title: A fun place to visit with friends, enjoy live music
data.text: This is a unique place with cozy seating areas, pleasant atmosphere in an old building.  Rodney and Nancy are usually on hand to make sure you are having a good time.  They have great ands on weekends, and sandwiches/salads....good for lunch, too.
